rooms.Name: In front of a large house.
rooms.Description:
You are standing in front of a large yellow house. There are windows all over
the front of the house at differing heights.. suggesting a two floor house.
There are some childrens toys out in the yard.. But besides that this house
looks well cared for.

rooms.Name: On the front porch of the house.
rooms.Description:
You are standing on a large porch of the yellow house.  There are some small
toys piled up on one corner of the porch.  The door to the house is north 
of here.  And south will take you back to the street.  From inside the house
you hear the sound of children laughing and playing.

rooms.Name: Just inside the door of the house.
rooms.Description:
You are standing just inside the door of the pretty yellow house.  You 
can now hear the shouting and laughing of th children better now.  There
are some throw rugs on the floor here and you see a set of stairs leading
up right before you.  Just beside the door is an umbrella stand.

Exits.Description:
As you look up... You see a long hallway at the top of the stairs....
Just at the top of the stairs is a long painting.. looks like a western scene.

rooms.Name: In the hallway
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a short hallway.  Directly in front of you is a swinging 
door that must lead to the kitchen.  There are some small toys sitting here
on the floor.  On one side of you is a large wall with family pictures on 
the other side of you is the staircase that leads upstairs.

Exits.Description:
This is a swinging door.. must lead to the kitchen.. better watch out..
we wouldn't want you to get hit!

rooms.Name: On the stairs
rooms.Description:
You are standing on the stairs.  All along the wall going up the stairs
you see lots of family portraits.  There must me a couple of kids that live
here.. You see photos of a boy and a girl.  There is a long oak banister 
along one side of the stairs for you to hold on to as you go up.  At the 
top of the stairs there is a long western looking portrait.

rooms.Name: In front of Andy's room
rooms.Description:
You are standing in front of a door.  There are signs on the door that look
to have been made by a child.  The sign is in red crayon and says "Andy's
Room" .  There are also pictures of cowboys on the door.  All around you
you see toys that look to have gotten out into the hallway from the room
..Wonder how that happened...

rooms.Name: In andy's room
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a typical kids room.  There is a crib in one corner 
and in the corner opposite is a twin bed.  This kid must love cowboys,  The
entire room is covered in cowboy pictures and the bed quilt on it that
shows the picture of a cowboy.

rooms.Name: kitchen
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the standard suburbia kitchen.  There is a small dinette
set here for a small family to eat dinner on.  A large refrigerator is sitting
here and keeping tonights dinner nice and cool.  You see the normal kitchen
things here.. Stove, Oven, Cabinets, and a sink.. nothing else to see in here.

Exits.Description:
There is a swinging door here.. Be careful not to get hit when going 
through it.

rooms.Name: Dining room
rooms.Description:
This room looks like someone is moving out as well.  The table and chairs
are still here but looks like someone has packed the dishes and decorations
away.  Sitting on the table is a big birthday cake, all around the cake are
plates and hats with pictures of cowboys on them.  There are streamers and
balloons hanging all around, giving the place a festive appearance.

rooms.Name: Living room
rooms.Description:
This is a large living room.  There is a t.v. here on a small cart and a
couple of chairs here as well.  There is a large archway to the north and
just over the archway is a huge sign saying " HAPPY BIRTHDAY ".  Wonder who
is having a party today?

rooms.Name: In Andy's closet
rooms.Description:
This is a closet.  There are hangers above your head and there are clothes
hanging on the bar.  Under your feet are some toys and some shoes. Here 
again, There are more pictures of cowboys taped to the back of the closet 
door... talk about loving cowboys.. sheesh!

rooms.Name: In front of Sid's house.
rooms.Description:
You are standing in front of a house that looks mostly well taken care of.
There are toys all over the yard but.. most of the toys look like they were
damaged in a fire.  You wonder what happened to these toys that they are sooo
torn up. In the distance you hear a dog barking and wonder if it's safe to be
wandering around in someone's yard.

rooms.Name: Top of the staircase.
rooms.Description:
You are standing at the top of a long staircase.  Just in front of you is 
a large western portrait. Just below that portrait is a low table that 
holds a vase of fresh flowers.   The floor looks to be wood but there
are area rugs here and there.  The Hallway continues down and there are 
rooms further down the hallway.

rooms.Name: Further down the hallway.
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the middle of a hallway.  There is an area rug here that 
you are standing on.  The walls here appear to be bare.. as though someone
might be moving.  When you look closer at the walls you see the outline of
where pictures might have been hung.

rooms.Name: On the sidewalk in front of the house.
rooms.Description:
You are standing on a sidewalk in front of a house.  There are some toys
scattered about the lawn but other than that the house appears to be well
cared for.  The driveway is west of here and in the driveway there is a 
mini-van.  The mini-van is in some pastel color and there is a sign in the
window of the van that says "Baby on board".

rooms.Name: On the front porch of the house.
rooms.Description:
You are standing on a large porch of the yellow house.  There are some small
toys piled up on one corner of the porch.  The door to the house is north 
of here.  And south will take you back to the street.  From inside the house
you hear the sound of children laughing and playing.

rooms.Name: On the driveway.
rooms.Description:
You are standing on a long driveway.  To one side of you is the house
that you just came out of, On the other side is another house that doesn't 
look as well cared for.  There is a mini-van sitting here and it looks to 
running.. feel like going for a ride?

rooms.Name: In the mini-van.
rooms.Description:
As soon as you get into the mini-van.. the door slams and it takes 
off with you in it.  Oh Gosh.. what are you gonna do now?  You ride for 
just minute.. while trying to figure out what to do when all of the sudden.. i
It stops.. and the door opens.. better get out now while you have the chance.

rooms.Name: At a gas station
rooms.Description:
As you are thrown to the concrete you look up, and before you can say 
anything the van takes off and leaves you behind.  You stand up and 
start looking around.  This is your average gas station.  There are two
pumps right beside you and another two a little further away.  There
is a big rotating sign above you with a big dinosaur on it.  Just a little
further away from you is a small food mart.  WATCH OUT!!!!! You are just 
about run over by a large semi truck.. better watch where you stand 
around and day dream.

rooms.Name: Under a large rack of oil.
rooms.Description:
You are sitting under a large rack of oil that is for sale.  You are hiding
so that you won't get run over by anymore wayward vehicles.  There is another
automobile sitting here, Its a truck and on the side it says Pizza Planet.
Maybe if you hop in it you can find that mini-van that left you behind.
But... the driver probably wouldn't take to kindly to riders.. better
hide..in the back would be a good place.

rooms.Name: Behind a truck.
rooms.Description:
You are standing behind the pizza planet truck.  If you climb up you can get
into the back of the truck.  Whatever you decide to do.. make it quick..
these gas fumes are staring to make you dizzy. You can hear voices talking
and from the sound of things.. you are about to be left behind again.. Hurry
and get in!

Exits.Description:
This is the back end of the truck.. You are gonna have to open the topper to
get in.. wonder if you are strong enough...

rooms.Name: In the back of a truck.
rooms.Description:
You are in the back of a pick-up truck.  There are all sorts of cups and fast
food packaging in here from a place called pizza planet.  There is a large
tool box that comes threatening close as the truck turns corners at a high
rate of speed.  As you ride along you notice that the window between the cab
and bed of the pick-up truck is open and you can hear the sound of a radio
drifting through.  There is a young man driving the truck.. he looks to be
about 17 years old.  If you are careful you could climb into the front of the
truck but I wouldn't suggest it.. cause he doesn't look like he's in a good
mood.. But then.. what 17 year old is?

Exits.Description: This is a small glass door.. but it's open right now..

ExtraDescs.Description:
You look at the large tool box as it flys by you and you notice that the
brand name on it is Binford.  Wow.. isn't that... nah.. couldn't be...could
it?

rooms.Name: The front of the Pizza planet truck.
rooms.Description:
This is the front of the truck.  Once you get in the front.. you wished you
would have stayed in the back.  If you had stayed in the back you wouldn't
have seen how bad this kid drives.  There are things flying all over the cab
of the truck and you feel like you are about to be launched out of the
windshield. The driver eyes you and you think you are ok.. But you better
watch him.. he's a shifty looking man.

rooms.Name: Along an aisle of Video games in Pizza Planet!
rooms.Description:
You are walking along an aisle of video games.  There are all the best games
all around.  There are kids here and there racking up nice high scores. You
look between the machines and notice that there is a large area between the
aisles where the machines are pulled into a circle. You wonder if you might
could squeeze in between the machines...

rooms.Name: DINOMART!
rooms.Description:
This is your ordinary food mart.  There isn't really anything here that you
wouldn't find at your local gas station. There are cokes and cigerettes and
overpriced items galore.  If you ask the guy behind the counter.. he just
might be able to show you some skills.. you never can tell about people.

rooms.Name: In Sid's backpack.
rooms.Description:
You seem to be in a large backpack.  There seems to be some other toys and
things in this back pack.  There are a few notebooks here and you can tell by
the way the backpack moves that you are not sitting on a stationery surface.
There is a small amount of light coming through the teeth of the zipper.. so
you know that wherever you are.. it's not dark.

Exits.Description:
This is the zipper in this backpack.. It's huge...Maybe if you open it just a
bit....

rooms.Name: On the driveway of Sid's house.
rooms.Description:
This driveway runs the length of the house.  There are no cars sitting here
and once again there are more toys here.  The people in the house next door
appear to be moving today.. all you can hear is the sounds of the moving men
carrying furniture out of the house.

rooms.Name: In Sid's backyard.
rooms.Description:
This backyard looks like a war zone.  There is a sandbox here filled with the
corpes of plastic army men that have been blown up.  There are more toys here
that look like they have been dismantled and put back together with all the
wrong pieces.  A picnic table sits in one corner of the yard while a shed
occupies the other corner.

rooms.Name: In the kitchen of sid's house.
rooms.Description:
This kitchen is just like any other in any home .. anywhere.  There is a
stove and a refrigerator.  There is a small table and chairs here where the
family sits to eat.  On the refrigerator seems to be art work of some kind
that the children brought home to their mother... You can tell that one child
is a bit different just by the way all his pictures include blood and gore.

rooms.Name: Sid's bedroom.
rooms.Description:
You look like you have entered the bowels of hell.   There are posters all
over the walls that look like some criminal was hired to decorate this room.
There are burn marks on all the posters... this kid must be a pyromaniac.
There are toys all around that look like they have been dismantled and thrown
together with all the wrong parts.

Exits.Description:
This seems to be the only door out of here.. But watch out... There might be
things out there that are willing to eat you alive...

rooms.Name: In the parking lot of PIZZA PLANET!
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a large parking lot.  The lot is full of cars and you can
see people all around the parking lot moving towards the building.  The 
front of the building is all lit up and is fashioned to look like a large
hanger for space ships.  Above the door of this establishment is a sign 
that says "PIZZA PLANET" and the door has a smaller sign on it that says
"Air Lock - Enter here".  As you step up to the doors you can hear the 
simulated whoosh sound of the doors. To either side of the door are 
large mannequins dressed in costumes and animated to look like they are
standing guard over the entrance.

rooms.Name: Just before the Airlock
rooms.Description:
You are standing in front of the airlock.  There are two large "guards"
standing here guarding the entrance.  The guards are rather large being from
some other planet.  Their large weapons are crossed over the large doors
barring your entrance.. Wonder how you can convince them to let you in.

rooms.Name: Inside the airlock at PIZZA PLANET!
rooms.Description:
You finally made it past the guards.   You are standing in a long bare 
hallway.. The walls are black and the light in here is terrible.  The only
light in here at all are coming from some star shaped lights stuck in the 
black ceiling like stars in a night sky.  To the north you will enter the 
arcade.

rooms.Name: Just inside PIZZA PLANET!!
rooms.Description:
THIS PLACE IS GREAT!!  Have you died and gone to heaven?  NO way.. But
it's close.  There are video games all around you.  Kids are playing the 
games and beeping and buzzing their way to high scores.  Every few 
minutes there are more announcements that sounds like lift off commands,
but really are only announcements to tell you where to get your pizza. To 
the north are a big circle of games that are all lite up.  And to the east 
there is a HUGE CRANE game.  In the crane game you see scores of little 
Plastic Aliens.. and you can have one.. For a small fee.

rooms.Name: Behind some video games.
rooms.Description:
This is a large circle of empty space created when they made a big circle of
the video games.  All you can see back here is the back of the video games
and some tokens, Other than that.. just a lot of dust bunnies. The area is
really long and full of lots of dust and debris.  Maybe you ought to just go
out and look around at all the other games.

rooms.Name: Inside the door of the crane machine
rooms.Description:
You are just inside the door of the crane machine.  This is where all your
prizes drop once you snag em with the big claw.  All that is in here now is a
little bit of dust. There isn't really much to see here.. But if you are
really quiet you hear voices.. could it be the alien toys?

rooms.Name: In front of the crane machine.
rooms.Description:
You are standing in front of the crane machine.. You look inside and notice
that it's full of lots of plastic alien toys.   Above the machine is a sign
that says "Flight to mars: Departing now" so.. you assume that this game is
just waiting for you to take home a pocketful of these little guys... Feel
like trying your luck?

rooms.Name: Inside the crane machine.
rooms.Description:
You are down inside the machine now and there are all kinds of toys all
around you.  There really isn't much to see.. at the top of the machine there
is a large shiny claw.  All the little aliens are moving around and looking
up at the claw in anticipation.

rooms.Name: Inside the crane machine.
rooms.Description:
You are down inside the crane machine now.  There are all kinds of toys all
around you and they are shuffling around as much as they possibly can with
the limited room there is.  The are all talking in hushed voices and looking
up expectedly at the claw that hangs above.

rooms.Name: inside the crane machine.
rooms.Description:
You are standing down inside the crane machine.  There are all kinds of toys
here and they are standing around looking up at the claw.  There is a door
here that they use to fill up the game when all the toys are gone. The door
appears to be locked.

rooms.Name: Hanna's room
rooms.Description:
This is Sid's sister's room.  Hanna loves her babies.. She has a table set
with lots of little tea cups and all her headless dolls.  Well her dolls
weren't headless til Sid got his grubby little hands on em. There is a large
canopy bed here and everything looks soft and sweet...except for the headless
dolls.

Exits.Description: This is the hallway... Going back out?

rooms.Name: T.V. Room
rooms.Description:
This is just a regular room.  The family has put a tv in here and just a few
steps away from the television is a comfy easy chair.  Oh my Gosh.. someone
is asleep in the easy chair.  There is a root beer can sitting on the floor
and the t.v. is blaring some program.. Better get out of here before you wake
Sid's dad.

Exits.Description: This leads back out into the hallway.

rooms.Name: The Foyer
rooms.Description:
This is the foyer.  The floor is covered in a light brown tile.  You can see
up the stairs from here and you can peek into the kitchen as well.  There are
more toys sitting here and there.. They also look like they have either been
blown or gnawed to bits.

rooms.Name: On the stairs.
rooms.Description:
These stairs are pretty ordinary.. There is a window high above you and its
open to let as much of the summer air in as possible.  There is carpet on the
stairs to keep people from slipping and a wrought iron hand rail to hold on
to... The only difference is a dog that seems to be stuck in the middle
taking a long nap.

rooms.Name: A Hallway
rooms.Description:
This is an ordinary hallway.  There is nothing very distinguishable about it.
There are a couple of pictures here and there and the floor is carpeted.
There a ppears to be some other doors further down the hallway.. Wonder what
is behind those...

Exits.Description: This leads to Hanna's room.. There are hearts and flowers all over the door

rooms.Name: A hallway
rooms.Description:
You are further down the hallway.  As you look around you notice the stairs
to the east and the window that hands far above them.  There is a wrought
iron handrail here that prevents people from falling over.  It seem that
there are a couple of doors here.. are you brave enough to investigate.

Exits.Description: This looks like a closet...hmmm Wanna open the door and check it out?

rooms.Name: closet
rooms.Description:
This is a typical upstairs closet.. It's full of old sporting goods and lots
of christmas decorations that people aren't using in the middle of summer.
Be really careful in here.. there is a bowling ball perched on a top shelf
that looks to fall off the shelf and knock your head off.

Exits.Description: This is the hallway.. Same old same old..

rooms.Name: A Hallway
rooms.Description:
You have come to the end of the hallway. There is only one door left down
here and you can hear the sounds of a tv program coming through the door.
There are a couple pictures hanging on the walls here as well.

Exits.Description:
This looks like it might be a family room or a tv room or something.. and
besides you can hear the sounds of a tv coming from the other side.

rooms.Name: Out on the street
rooms.Description:
You are standing out in front of the house you just came out of.  Looking
back you are wondering how you got out of that house without leaving some
parts of your body behind.  There is an enormous moving van sitting here and
looking in it you see the belongings of the neighbors that are moving.
Maybe.. if you hop in.. and hide.. you can catch a ride away from this insane
house.

rooms.Name: In the moving van
rooms.Description:
You are in a moving van.. There are tons of boxes in here and lots of
furniture sitting around.  The van stops and you figure you better get out
before those BIG moving men find you back here.

rooms.Name: Andy's room
rooms.Description:
This is the corner of Andy's room  where his bed sits.   There are toys all
around you on the floor. Most of Andy's toys look to be well cared for.
There is a large window here and you can look out over the yard you used to
enter this house.

Exits.Description:
This is a cool bucket of plastic toy soldiers.. cool ... something you
remember....

rooms.Name: Andy's room
rooms.Description:
You are just east ofeast of Andy's bed.  There is a toy box here that is
brimming with toys. There is a large bookcase here that has games and books
stacked on all the shelves. You wonder how a kid has time to play with all
these toys.

Exits.Description:
Neato Bandito... It's a barrel of monkies... Have you played this game
recently?

rooms.Name: Andy's room
rooms.Description:
This is the corner dedicated to Molly's crib.  There isn't much else here
besides a crib with a mobile over it. There are some boxes with western scens
painted on underneath but yoi figure that was just the best place to store
them.

Exits.Description: There is a closet here.

rooms.Name: Inside a barrel of monkeys.
rooms.Description:
Oh wow.. You remember this game from when you were a kid.  You take the
little monkeys with the bent arms and try and hook as many as you can.  Wow..
why do all these monkeys sort of look rabid?

rooms.Name: Bucket of soldiers.
rooms.Description:
You are standing knee deep in green plastic soldiers.  There are all around
you with frozen looks on their faces.. Just when you think.. that they don't
move.. you think you see one of them move.. Hmmmm ..wierd

rooms.Name: By the pizza planet counter.
rooms.Description:
Wow.. cool here is where you get pizza and coke.  The guy behind the counter
would just love to sell you something. So just type list and see what he has.
There are big signs here that tell what he's selling and they are all
inviting you to try their new pizza.. It's called Mars Fulla-meat pizza.

rooms.Name: On a street
rooms.Description:
This is just your average normal neighborhood.  There are people out in their
yards and they are playing with kids and mowing lawns.  To the north is an
average looking house and there is a sign here that you NEED to read.

ExtraDescs.Description:
HI everyone, Welcome to Toy Story.  This zone is strictly for newbies.  In
building this zone.. we were sure to make the mobs killable and that the zone
would be incredibly newbie friendly.  All the eq in this zone is geared as
leveling eq.. But remember.. This is eq is GOOD eq for newbies and it will
help you level.. But it's not eq you can keep forever *THIS EQ WILL DISAPPEAR
FROM YOUR BODY AT LEVEL 25*  So play the zone ..Enjoy the exp (it should get
you to level 10 or above if you kill everything) and be sure to look for
guildmasters in there to help practice your skills.. And If you see Andy's
mom at the beginning of the zone.. she has a very special prize for you to
help you through the zone.  :) Have fun.. this is my gift for newbies
everywhere.. Teddy
